DOC.brief_title: Tadalafil Taken Daily Compared Placebo Improvement Getting Maintaining Erection Sexual Quality Life
DOC.criteria: Male History erectile dysfunction ( ED ) least 3 month duration Anticipate female partner willing participate throughout study At least 18 year age Visit 1 agree make least 4 sexual attempt early phase study Adequate partner sexual function determine Female Sexual Function Index Willing record responses efficacy questionnaire , sexual quality life questionnaires instrument use study May participate study take tadalafil previously . History cardiac condition include angina require treatment nitrate , heart disease coronary condition include myocardial infarction , bypass surgery , angioplasty stent placement specify time start study . Have sexual partner willing complete scale . Use nitrate .
